name: Expanded_Robot_Tech
author: Natfrac42
title: 机器人研究扩展
description: 增加更多两种机器人的研究。包括机器人速度，玩家的物流包大小，机器人载货量以及玩家回收包大小等。
description_original: Adds in more technologies for worker and construction robots including robot speed, robot carrying capacity, character trash slots and character logistics slots.
